bibl.title: From Egypt to Palestine: Two Notes on Published Texts.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 145-148: new interpretation of the epitaph (of Egyptian origin) of Valeria Thermouthis [= Adam Łajtar et Alfred Twardecki, Catalogue des inscriptions grecques du Musée National de Varsovie = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume II (Varsovie, 2003) No. 75].
bibl.seg: Łajtar Adam, From Egypt to Palestine: Two Notes on Published Texts.

See in part. pp. 145-148: new interpretation of the epitaph (of Egyptian origin) of Valeria Thermouthis [= Adam Łajtar et Alfred Twardecki, Catalogue des inscriptions grecques du Musée National de Varsovie = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume II (Varsovie, 2003) No. 75].
